DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Eletriptan Treatment Migraine Patients Not Satisfied With Rizatriptan Therapy
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis migraine headache accord International Headache Society criterion migraine headache least 1 year Eletriptan naive Previously treat rizatriptan fail achieve satisfactory response within past 12 month Nonmigraine headaches average 6 day per month le 24 hour freedom headache migraine attack Migraine attack atypical chronic daily headaches A history migraine prolong aura , familial hemiplegic migraine , basilar migraine , migrainous infarction , migraine aura without headache , migraine acute onset aura
